Лагает, поиск игры за маньяка висит бесконечно, какие-то непонятные лаги постоянно происходят по типу вечной загрузки

UPD: почти год прошел с момента написания обзора, я решил дать еще один шанс этой игре. И не прогадал, разработчики подтянули все винты, лагов стало значительно меньше, подвезли оптимизацию (раньше 30-40 фпс было на минималках даже с моими нищими характеристиками), сейчас же стабильные 60 кадров, новые анимации, маньяки и выжившие.

Сейчас можно смело рекомендовать эту игру тем, кому все надоело и хочется тупо повыживать или поохотиться:)
Отличная сюжетная линия. Жду когда добавят пуджа из доты в эту игру, а к сурвам инвокера.

Ein Spiel was echt viel Spaß machen kann, wenn alles funktioniert.
Ein riesen Nachteil ist die suche nach einer Lobby.
Wenn man das Spiel als Neuling spielen will als Killer, findet man keine Lobby. So wie ich. Ich habe immer lieber als Survivor gespielt mit Freunden, aber man will ja auch mal Killer sein. Und mit Rang 20 als Killer ist das finden einer Lobby unmöglich.
Gerade auch jetzt wo das Archiv im Spiel ist, werden einem viele Blutpunkte vorenthalten bzw diese Blutpunkte gehen einem verloren. Das ist nicht gerade nett von den Entwicklern gelöst und man wird dafür auch noch echt bestraft. Lohnt sich also gerade für Leute die das Spiel neu anfangen wollen überhaupt nicht.
Ein weiteres problem ist die Hitbox, wenn man als Survivor zb durch ein Fenster springt und der Killer eigentlich bei einem Schlag die Wand treffen müsste, aber in DBD ist eh alles anders.
NO IDEA WHATS GOING ON. BUT HAVING GOOD TIME

You know a game has got it by the wrong end when you have a horribly optimized $19.99 game that is riddled with bugs & server issues, but still manages to pump out $120+ worth of DLC.

The state the game is currently in is unacceptable, and that's 3.5 years down the line.

Идея игры очень крутая бегать от маньяка спасать товарищей.Но, но!!! хит баги через палеты, бывают хит ловиш с километра, но что больше убивает это постоянный поиск сервов за мана. Сыграл 1 раз, 2 раз через час либо сразу перезапуск и то в лучшем случаее. Разрабы выпускают обновы на новые персы делают различные фиксы, но игра не становиться стабильной, как за мана так и за сурва.  Не рекомендую людям со слабыми нервами, да и вобще не рекомендую.

Lots of minorities who are severely under-educated play this stupid, ten dollar game. Controls are whacked. In your first day playing you are absolutely guaranteed to find a highly toxic community of scum, filth, and retarded / challenged people, and also really old boomers who play this lame game. Why do I keep coming back? It's fun beating campers. And this game has a LOT of campers. You'll see, just play for like one hour and you'll see killers that camp hooks, camp dropped boards, camp by repeatedly looping back in areas, camping exits, and basically camping with Camper's builds.

Dead by Daylight is an asymmetric team vs monster game similar to games like Evo or Friday The 13th, borrowing mostly from the latter survival experience.  In this game, you are either a survivor or a killer.  Your goal as a survivor is to escape the enclosed area by repairing usually 5 generators on the map.  On this map will also be a killer whose job it is to injure or kill the survivors.  

Unlike other games, however, here's no 100% win condition.  Rather, each individual gets a score based on how they did and what they did in the game.  Survivors get more points for rescuing and healing other survivors, stunning the killer, prolonging chases, and length of time in game.  Killers get points for injuring, killing, sacrificing survivors, damaging generators, and the like.  

Now that you know how the game plays, is it any good?  The short answer is:  Yes, it is fun, but the long answer is it's also a mixed bag.  

The presentation is definitely very good.  Graphics, sound, environment, and the like are all very well crafted and are designed for the horror theme.  Some things like the overabundance of pallets are less realistic as to serve the gameplay purpose for counterplay to the killer.  Also, each survivor and killer has a backstory that you could use to help identify with that specific person.  

Gameplay wise, the game is fun all round, but there is an inconsistency with how fun survivors and killers are and you'll see why this matters in a second, but first let's go through the killer's gameplay.  There are I think 14 killers in the game right now.  Each killer has a unique play style, a unique power including perks and addons specific to that power, multiple different strategies for  approaching tracking, catching, chasing, and injuring / sacrificing survivors.  Playing killer is a blast, and because the game holds your hand by showing the location of every single generator, every single hook, everything you need, it's also noob friendly.

And this is where it's inconsistent, because while survivor is fun, there isn't the same level of strategic depth.  Playing as a survivor has more to do with teamwork with teammates and juking out the killer.  The chase can be fun, but as a survivor, you have no unique differences between one survivor and the next other than the starting perks, which can be earned by every other survivor over time, and the perkas for survivors pertain to stat bonuses more than unique mechanics, like for example the ability to sprint faster or vault through windows faster.  

And there is where the problem lies.  If you want to play as killer, which is superior, you will need to wait often 10 minutes more in queue to get a game, because most others are queuing killer as well.  As a survivor, you can get in right away, but because it is not newbie friendly, you're going to get lost very quickly with teammates who aren't coordinating.  You don't get icons for where generators are so you'll have to get used to knowing where they are or what the indicators are.  

In addition, there are some balance issues with certain killers being much more powerful and some killers having almost completely useless powers. 

This is a good game, but if it wants to become great it needs to add some unique mechanics to survivors and and give the game some long overdue and real balance.

I got this game on ps4 as a free game. I'd seen it but never really looked at it. The premise is simple. 4 survivors, 1 killer. Try to get out, or kill the 4 man team. It looked fun, I liked the idea. First time I tried it was a lot of fun, I watched some streamers and played for a while before getting frustrated and then giving it up. When I got back into it, I started learning the depth involved in it.

This game is challenging, frustrating, but so much fun. Definitely something to play with friends, but also the experiences you can have playing alone are worth it. I bought it on pc and the game opened up for me. Definitely meant to be played on pc over console. 

I've got probably 130 hours on ps4. 200 and growing on pc. I play almost every day even if only a game or two. There is a lot of strategy and forward thinking involved. Specific skills are developed, but if you can push through the original frustration of learning, you'll learn to love this game.
if you dont rage alot this game for you
The game is very balanced and skill based but the community can be very toxic. Overall fantastic game to play with friends and even alone.
Very good to play with friends
